sqlMap.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.MEM_ID, C.CART_STATUS, NVL(C.EDU_NO, '없음') EDU_NO, NVL(C.KIN_CODE, '없음') KIN_CODE, NVL(C.CLS_NO, '없음') CLS_NO, NVL((SELECT to_char(KIN_FEE) FROM KINDERGARTEN K WHERE K.KIN_CODE = C.KIN_CODE), '없음') KIN_FEE, NVL((SELECT KIN_GUBUN FROM KINDERGARTEN K WHERE K.KIN_CODE = C.KIN_CODE),'없음') KIN_GUBUN, NVL((SELECT to_char(CLS_FEE) FROM CLASS CL WHERE CL.CLS_NO = C.CLS_NO),'없음') CLS_FEE, NVL((SELECT CLS_SUBJECT FROM CLASS CL WHERE CL.CLS_NO = C.CLS_NO),'없음') CLS_SUBJECT, NVL((SELECT CLS_TITLE FROM CLASS CL WHERE CL.CLS_NO = C.CLS_NO),'없음') CLS_TITLE, NVL((SELECT to_char(EDU_FEE) FROM EDUCATION E WHERE E.EDU_NO = C.EDU_NO),'없음') EDU_FEE, NVL((SELECT EDU_TITLE FROM EDUCATION E WHERE E.EDU_NO = C.EDU_NO),'없음') EDU_TITLE FROM CART C WHERE MEM_ID = #data# AND CART_STATUS = '미결' ORDER BY SUBSTR(CART_NO,1,6) DESC

SELECT C.CART_NO, C.MEM_ID, C.CART_STATUS, NVL(C.EDU_NO, 0) EDU_NO, NVL(C.KIN_CODE, '없음') KIN_CODE, NVL(C.CLS_NO, 0) CLS_NO, NVL(K.KIN_GUBUN, '없음') KIN_GUBUN, NVL(CL.CLS_SUBJECT, '없음') CLS_SUBJECT, NVL(E.EDU_TITLE, '없음') EDU_TITLE, NVL(K.KIN_FEE, 0) KIN_FEE, NVL(CL.CLS_FEE, 0) CLS_FEE, NVL(E.EDU_FEE, 0) EDU_FEE, TO_DATE(20||SUBSTR(C.PAY_NO,1,6), 'YYYY-MM-DD') PAY_NO FROM CART C, KINDERGARTEN K, CLASS CL, EDUCATION E WHERE C.KIN_CODE = K.KIN_CODE(+) AND C.CLS_NO = CL.CLS_NO(+) AND C.EDU_NO = E.EDU_NO(+) AND C.CART_STATUS != '미결' AND C.MEM_ID = #data#
SELECT * FROM CART WHERE TO_DATE(SUBSTR(PAY_NO,1,6), 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(TO_DATE(#data#), 'YY/MM/DD'))
sqlMap.insert: insert into cart(cart_no, mem_id, cart_status, kin_code) values(class_seq.nextVal, #mem_id#, '미결', (SELECT KIN_CODE FROM KINDERGARTEN WHERE SUBSTR(KIN_CODE,2,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,4,2)))
insert into cart(cart_no, mem_id, cart_status, cls_no) values(class_seq.nextVal, #mem_id#, '미결', (select min(cls_no) from class where cls_subject = #cls_subject#))
insert into cart(cart_no, mem_id, cart_status, edu_no) values(class_seq.nextVal, #mem_id#, '미결', #edu_no#)
sqlMap.update: update cart set kin_code is null where mem_id = #mem_id# and cart_status = '미결' and kin_code = #kin_code#
update cart set cls_no is null where mem_id = #mem_id# and cart_status = '미결' and cls_no = #cls_no#
update cart set edu_no is null where mem_id = #mem_id# and cart_status = '미결' and edu_no = #edu_no#
sqlMap.select: select count(kin_code) kin_code, count(edu_no) edu_no from cart where mem_id = #mem_id# and cart_status = '미결' and pay_no is null
sqlMap.update: update cart set cart_status = '결제', pay_no = #pay_no# where mem_id = #mem_id# and cart_status = '미결'
